data.review_text: Jade is definitely best of the hairdressers in the area. Lovely and knows what the client wants. Highly recommend!!
Jade always does an amazing job with my hair!!! Wont let anybody else touch it.
Beeeest hairdresser ever! Always feel dead welcome in the salon, always done a brilliant job! Couldn't recommend Jade enough!!
Amazing professional and reliable. Talking through the whole time what she wAs doing. Absolutely love my hair! Thanks again jade. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
Highly recommend jade! Love my hair n gives good advice and so friendly ..... x

Excellent hairdresser been going to jade for just over a year now!!and great results everytime  great customer service :-D would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great hairdresser with great prices.
After a few bad experiences with mobile hairdresser i saw jades advert. Been very happy with result. New customer!
Absolutely love my hair now. Showed Jade a pic of what I fancied.... And tad-ah.... She got it exactly how I wanted it. Perfect, highly recommend!
Love my hair when jades done it. Always does a fab job and always willing to advise on treatments. Very good customer service. Lovely young lady Highly recomended.xx
Fantastic place, Jade did my wedding hair and it was beautiful. Wouldn't trust anyone else with my hair!

Jade did my hair a few weeks ago, it was well in need of a good seeing to. She did an amazing job and I was so happy with the result. Lovely service and had a good matter. All round amazing job. Would HIGHLY recommend!  xxx
Always does my hair brilliantly, the only person who has made my hair go blonder, and blonder

Jade always does a fab job on my hair and she's the only person who can cut it right  and trust with my hair I've been other places but always ended back with Jade  she's a brilliant and talented hairdresser I recommend Jade to my Aunty and now she always go to Jade xxxxx

Very talented hairdresser. Love my hair after every visit. She gets it perfect every time! Always willing to offer styling tips/products suitable for my hair type. Wouldn't go anywhere else! Highly recommend xx
I love jade doing my hair, always get commented on it after I've had it done!, haven't been for a while but will be there when it's payday lol, amazing jade is xx
I love jade doing my hair she always knows exactly what I want ;) thank you jade for being so good. Also always feel so welcome xx
Fantastic hairdresser, does an amazing job on both men and women's hair, very professional and friendly.
Love jade doing my hair she does a great job every time !!.. And always gives me advice on what's best for my hair etc ... And great prices!!
Great colour and cut very professional service thanks Jade
Been going to jade for a few years now and always get a lovely cut and colour at a great price aswell! Lovely girl and always feel comfortable
